title: Defense Rests in Ghislaine Maxwell Trial
sub_head: Earlier, Jeffrey Epstein’s former girlfriend testified to counter claims made by four accusers
body:
The defense wrapped up its case in British socialite Ghislaine Maxwell’s sex-trafficking trial Friday, setting the stage for closing arguments and jury deliberations next week.
Before the defense rested, Ms. Maxwell said she wouldn’t testify, after U.S. district Judge Alison Nathan instructed her that she had the right to do so.
